title: Music NFTs: I'm not convinced...yet.
body:
### NFTs in Music - Why I'm not convinced (yet)

**Spotify:** Today, do music streaming apps know I've bought an NFT song / album so it plays onlyÂ ***via my***Â Spotify or Apple music account? How do I show off my NFT playlist or that one off exclusive NFT song remix (well, ok... NFT 0008 off of a 1000 mint) that I paid a bomb for.

Rarity proof when it matters...how?

**NFT Music Concert Tickets:** How practical is it to authenticate NFT tickets displayed as a screenshot / dApp at a crowded concert gate? This is as much an open question as it is food-for-thought.

via twitter, a user @Mousselect pointed me toÂ **[this solution](https://faq.get-protocol.io/get-protocol-products/get-protocol-nft-ticket-explorer)**Â that may be worth investigating.

**Label Copyright Infringement:** Selling 'beats' and 'loops' as NFTs are cool, but what happens when the artist who minted them, then sells the album or song to a record label? What happens to the rights of the NFT loop buyer to use it in a remix/tune...

**Summary:** Corporates, Artists and Media organizations looking at the Metaverse, should see to it that these issues are ironed out before having them buy-in. Don't let men-in-Armani-suits sell a pitch deck that isn't finalized, yet filled with jargon du jour; (immutable ledger, block-chain, on-chain, DAO...etc.)

### My NFT music purchase in the Metaverse:

We aren't even talking about the \[very real\] blockchain inter-compatibility issues that arise. How would a music NFT bought on the Ethereum Blockchain play out when a user enters a "metaverse" running on the Algorand chain or the Solana chain and vice-versa. Would it be a seamless streaming experience for the user (avatar) as seamless as it is today when we *bluetooth* our music from headphones to car audio system?

Music NFTs before they are sold by studios and artistes should be addressing these questions. This would be the right way to methodically build Metaverses devoid of crypto-parasites, and speculators currently plaguing Web3.

...but wait... there could be a solution to some of these issues. I could think of at least the first issue:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Sgni8CvFkjji-GpvG-nko.webp?height=394&width=701)

### Community Wallets: For Enhanced NFT experiences

Tally Ho! is a new "**[community owned and operated Web3 wallet](https://tally.cash/)**" and since NFTs are all about building a sense of community while also allowing members of such communities to express their uniqueness, what if such a wallet had a feature and as food-for-thought, could for instance...

**Unlock a higher fidelity version as an NFT song? -**Â This would encourage artistes to release NFTs of their songs offering perhaps a superior sampled version of the tune. We all know that music streaming services probably aren't streaming at optimal quality,Â **[as this 2019 article explains.](https://www.headphonesty.com/2019/07/sample-rate-bit-depth-bit-rate/)**

What if...a wallet such as Tally Ho! were to intercept a Spotify users playlist using,Â **[the Spotify API,](https://www.headphonesty.com/2019/07/sample-rate-bit-depth-bit-rate/)**Â and if it detects a song on the user's playlist for which the user also has an NFT version -- the wallet could seamlessly stream the owned (higher quality) or even a unique re-mix that the artiste released only as an NFT? *If I were a music artiste releasing an NFT this would be my strict mandate.*

Let's go further: The NFT could be recorded in a multichannel audio format - such as .mkv, where a single Music NFT could contain:

* Instrumental version.
* Acapella.
* Minus 1 (karaoke)

This way, at a party, the NFT owner's playlist could go from Karaoke, to amateur DJ. All because they invested in a music NFT. You have to give the NFT owner value in owning a music NFT which is otherwise available for free to all on Spotify or Apple music... ***As an artiste or Label selling (and later speculating on the crypto earned) an NTF song â€¦you are doing that, rightâ€¦right?***

Of course, this would require a streaming player being part of the "wallet". But that's where community driven projects such as the Tally Ho! wallet can shine. Letting developers write enhancement 'plugins'.

*This blog essay was written in response to a Blogging competition for the launch of the Tally Ho! wallet. I couldn't write just another article rehashing the virtues of a crypto- wallet (said to a Meta-Mask beating wallet).Â As a personal creative challenge to drive original thought, I brainstormed the above product ideas, aware they're worth a couple 100k to a product dept. at music streaming platforms looking at Web3.0-fying their platforms.*

Spotify, or Tidal or Apple...others... if you are planning on integrating NFT audio using any of these ideas, please send fiat currency, my way.

title: merchandising related to clothing
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aVVCkcoOvHucmYbtg99y5.png?height=270&width=397)

Recently I saw such a story in Wang Xiaobo's "The Silent Majority": It is said that before the Three Kingdoms, Yunnan was full of coconuts. The locals can eat coconut shredded rice, and coconut oil can also be eaten. The fibers in the coconut leaves can weave rough dresses, while the trunk of the coconut tree is wood. This tree can meet most of people's daily needs. One day Zhuge Liang led his troops to this point. He wanted to educate the local people, so he let them live in our way, sow in spring and harvest in autumn, wear our clothes, and obey our system.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/LD9pm5YjINX4vHWNH1L5p.png?height=266&width=432)

Farming is much more difficult than picking ready-made coconuts. This seemingly superior system is not very superior to the locals, so it is difficult to implement until Zhuge Liang felt that it would not work to educate only by talking, so It was ordered to cut down all the coconut trees in Yunnan, which forced people to follow such a troublesome way of life.

Of course, this is just a rumor. I don't know, and I don't really believe it, whether Zhuge Liang, who is a sage of a generation, will nakedly threaten the ignorant people with force. But from this incident, I can detect a phenomenon that often occurs around me: others always try to convince me with their own ideas or doctrines, forcing me to join their camp. And when I showed a little bit of disinterest, or even the slightest tendency to disapprove, others would show disgust and say, "Why are you like this!"

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ws5BRKU94XhVXAob1CVGI.png?height=270&width=424)

Of course, this is just my fantasy when I stare at other people's disappointed eyes, but the loneliness on the other's face is real and can be seen. Whenever this happens, I always have a tangle in my heart: I can't bear to see others feel unhappy because of me, but I can't accept opinions that are contrary to my own considerations. The final compromise is to have to deal with each other verbally, but inwardly cursing, but who is cursing? Itâ€™s not about scolding yourself, and itâ€™s not about scolding others. Feeling extremely depressed in the chest.

After so many experiences like this, I slowly learned to be good. I also stopped talking in public, and I avoided arguing with people in private. Change the subject as soon as you see signs of it. In doing so, I am truly one of the silent ones, but one of the few, not the majority, of my surroundings.

When I was in my twenties, I was obviously still a teenager, but after being so restrained, I had to resist. I don't consider myself an uncivilized barbarian, but even barbarians are unwilling to be educated by the so-called Central Plains people, not to mention that the gap between you and me is as big as a tractor and an old ox pulling a cart? Who will assess this gap?

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_VO8nQhfagw3XQYE8bQSz.png?height=270&width=396)

Who the hell gave them the right to replace my leaves with silk? The answer is themselves. I always think that my own thoughts are superior to others, so no matter whether others like it or not, I always want to put it on others. In Wang Xiaobo's words, although the material is good, "it can't cover sweat and prickly heat when wearing it on the body". If your theory is really that good, but I don't think it conforms to my actual situation, I might as well not listen to it, so why bother pretending to be worried and superior in an attempt to convince me. Doing nothing to change the tricks about clothes, wearing front and back, and then looking for people to sell them all over the street. And this is the side business that many people who have read books are keen on today. Fortunately, they know it is a side business. After all, they still don't know how to "make it clear". Stop and try on clothes. Otherwise, some people will have to be forced into the Castle Peak.

Looking at the long history, literati have learned this kind of sales since the birth of Confucius, and Mencius developed it to a climax. The phrase "no father and no king is a beast", I don't know how many people are embarrassed to talk. During the Cultural Revolution, it developed to the extreme, and people no longer had to try on clothes, because there is only one piece of clothing to wear today, and thinking about the other is not just ignorant, but reactionary.

Having said that, in order to do a prosperous business, in addition to having good salesmen, customers who are easily impressed are of course essential. Elliott Aronson mentioned in his "Social Animals" that conformity refers to changes in people's behavior or opinions caused by real or imagined pressures on a person or a group. Born in this land where harmony is the most important thing, we have a great environment for conforming to the crowd. Do you agree with this view? It just so happens that I am too, so we are confidants. Let's go, let's have a drink! Are you against that view? It doesn't matter, me too. Let's go, let's have a drink! This wine is indeed a good thing. After two or three glasses, people can trust each other, but it is unknown what the situation will be when he wakes up the next day.

What I'm trying to say is that it's easy to agree or disagree with an opinion under pressure from others around you, especially if the pressurer is some authority or someone close to you. So we often see that when two literati are arguing somewhere, there is always a large group of unreasonable people behind them who act as speakers. If you ask him why he is on this side, he will tell you that this person is reasonable, but when you ask what this principle is, people always like to go around and talk for a long time, from outer space to the inner womb, The final conclusion is: This man is right! Listeners will feel that this person knows astronomy and geography, but it is unclear whether there is a necessary connection with this principle. If there are too many people saying this, you will inevitably feel dizzy, and finally make yourself want to jump into the ring of fire with honor and shout: This person is right!

title: Running is not just for the first
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aF13n231iW2-4Tq2y8EtA.png?height=270&width=349)

When cheering is shouting everywhere, I can only listen to my own breathing. At this moment, only by myself can I believe that I can. When we cheer, just to be able to tell you that at this moment, I will be with you on the road to the top Not lonely, running is not only for the first.

Choose your true self, how many ways can you go up the hill, you have to open it up by yourself, run not only for the first, listen to your inner voice, every step is to prove you, the meaning of existence, when cheering everywhere shouts, I can only Listen to your own breathing. At this moment, only by being alone can you believe that I can. Running is not only for the first.

In order to create magic and let the world applaud you, you have to thank yourself. Running is not only for the first, the opponent is only yourself. When you work hard to take the first step, the champion is already you, and running is not only for the first...

It's hard to be a human being, it's hard to settle down, such a big world, such a small individual; there are too many people in the big world, so many people are both interconnected and excluding each other, time and space are irreversible, and the way they come is unpredictable.

It is extremely difficult. The difficult thing is how to find a place for myself in this crowded world. I gradually realized that in fact, I need very little in life. Asking from the world according to my inner voice often benefits a lot. It is not only It can meet your external needs, and even make up for the vacancies in your soul.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UPbb3FbR9K45krCiVHj9S.png?height=270&width=327)

So in those days when I felt that everything about myself was bound by desire, and my thoughts were bound by reality, I started running. Do only one thing a day, a year, or a lifetime, and do nothing without doing anything.

When running, I look farther and refine my goals. I find a way to choose between breathing and a sense of balance in the alternation of footsteps. I only enjoy the process of running every day, and only do this thing well. , do it seriously and do what you can.

One step at a time, I ran forward steadily. Looking back, I found that although I only did this one thing this year, I have gained a lot.

I have become no longer complicated and simple, I have become a regular life, and I can enjoy the freedom of my mind more. I have become free from the details, and I can deal with everything in life and work more calmly. It turns out that dreams and ideals are not needed. How lofty and great, only when you are in your heart can you fit your truest self.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/O1E3ZfCJGX3EQG3_24Xn_.png?height=266&width=471)

Only do one thing well, which is the rhythm of life at the beginning. No matter how busy or tired the days are, it will be light and easy, and no matter how hard or salty life is, it is not worth mentioning.

The only thing imprinted in our hearts by the years is Jinghao, because at a certain moment in the past, we only wanted to make the best of the thing at hand.

Things that have to be given up due to external forces are called ideas, and those that are unwilling to give up without being burdened by other things are dreams. This unstoppable power comes from within.

Don't waste time. Don't be greedy for the immediate pleasure, learn as much culture as you can when you are young, open your eyes, broaden your mind, train your wisdom, and you will have the capital to navigate the cracks of life when you are older. Don't feel inferior, and don't be too arrogant.

When a person is alive and understands a book or is good at one thing, there is no need to panic, even if there is a setback, it is temporary. The social mechanism itself must provide opportunities for those who have acquired special skills. Believe this, because society needs such people to function.

Running forward towards your dreams and ideals, as long as you persevere, although you will not succeed in the end, what you have experienced while running forward will always be a treasure in your growth.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/V-ulgXYORzzib0v965qI5.png?height=266&width=414)

Running is not only for the first, but more important is to work hard towards your dreams little by little. Success in your own sense is to surpass yourself, break through yourself, and give full play to your potential, perseverance, and self. The ability to sharpen oneself into a sharp sword, able to overcome obstacles on the way forward, sometimes the wind and waves will hang straight to the sea.

Running is not just for the first, but to strive forward, to struggle forward, and to strive forward, success will belong to us.

title: child moving stones
body:
The dictionary definition of going all out is: to put all one's strength into it. But what does it mean to put all your energy into it?

A story of "Children Moving Stones" may make people feel.

A wise father and his 7-year-old son were tidying up their back garden when they came across a large rock buried in the soil. The father felt that this was a good opportunity to educate the child, so he asked the child to remove the big stone by himself.

The child pushed the stone for a long time, but the stone still didn't move, so he cleverly dug a hole next to it, found a log and inserted it into the hole, put another small stone under it, and tried to pry it up, but the big stone still didn't move. . Obviously, his strength is not enough to move the big stone.

The child told the father that he couldn't move, and the father could see it clearly, but still said coldly that you had to do your best.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ea3Tt_WUXDJzaGeFfRELw.png?height=266&width=467)

This time, the child used all his strength, and his face was flushed red. Afterwards, he put his entire body weight on the wood, and the stone remained motionless. The child gasped and sat down slumped.

The father approached him kindly and asked, "Are you sure you really did your best?" The child said of course it did.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MdIOtoKJg_2SwhyYWToxX.png?height=266&width=460)

Then the father gently took the child's little hand and said, "No, son, you haven't done your best. I'm right next to you, but you haven't asked me for help."

Do your best, not only with your own strength, but also with external force. This is still the case for children moving stones, not to mention the struggles of all living beings.

With the development of society so far, there are inextricably linked relationships between people, and it is difficult for anyone to live in isolation in this world. Good at seeking help, with the help of external forces, often for self-interest and others. Furthermore, "gold is not pure, and no man is perfect." With the help of external forces, he can make up for his own shortcomings. A person who fights alone, no matter how great his ability is, will not be able to achieve real success.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/s3FjpeUrFhRPMXXe2cuuj.png?height=280&width=415)

Xunzi's "Encouraging Learning" has this sentence: "When you climb high and move, your arms will not be lengthened, but you will be far away; if you call down the wind, your voice will not be sicker, but you will hear it. Those who fake horses do not benefit feet. And it will lead to thousands of miles; those who are fake boats are not capable of water, but they are not capable of rivers.

Being diligent and eager to learn is not only about finding a needle and being brave in self-exploration, but also knowing how not to be ashamed to ask questions and ask for advice with an open mind.

Being proactive means not only being diligent and dedicated, but also knowing how to learn from the experience of predecessors and gather the wisdom of others.

Every effort in life can actually be associated with the help of external forces.

In ancient and modern times, at home and abroad, success with the help of external forces can be found everywhere. With the help of Galileo's theory, Newton created Newtonian mechanics. With the help of Zhang Liang's strategy and Han Xin's strategy of leading troops, Liu Bang, the great ancestor of the Han Dynasty, achieved the great Han Dynasty.

In nature, there is no lack of success with the help of external forces. The bright moon illuminates the night with the help of sunlight; the ivy shows itself with the help of the fence.

Archimedes has a famous saying: "Give me a fulcrum, and I can pry up the earth." This fulcrum is with the help of external force.

A person who knows how to use external force is a wise man in life. The wise have the greatest chance of success.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_pyFuP6VSXrUvFt9YaMXe.png?height=276&width=442)

Of course, relying on external force is not a force to seize, but to move according to the situation, to take advantage of wisdom, not to hurt people or damage, and to maximize one's own intelligence.

Learn to use external force, don't think that exhausting your own strength is called going all out.

title: Life is what we need to keep accumulating strength
body:
Worldly people can move forward only when the sun shines. When confronted with darkness, he becomes timid. How many people would rather put themselves in a bubble for the sake of the short-lived sunshine, bow their heads and bow their heads to others, and A Yu to please. Finally, under the care of the sun, the bubbles lifted off quickly, colorful and eye-catching. Unfortunately, the good times did not last long. When it exhausted the last moisture, it immediately turned into a cloud of smoke and dispersed with the wind. People's gains and losses, success and failure, prosperity and loneliness are just passing by. There is really no need to live in the eyes of others all the time. For this short moment, you will lose your eternal self.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/VqkIEikkMHzI7yPUKpwy6.png?height=266&width=429)

Life often plays tricks on us and makes it difficult to realize our visions. Sometimes you feel angry, but more often you feel helpless and sigh. "Desire" prompts people to become involuntary, to do some things that disgust and disgust themselves, and they have to humble themselves in front of their superiors and make compromises. Thinking about being a human being is such a contradiction, you have to wear a mask to survive. There is really no need to condemn yourself too much, and you must not disturb your state of mind for this. Because we are not saints, our minds have lost too much freedom, and our mood often becomes bad. Many things backfire. As long as we don't go beyond the bottom line of being a human being, don't violate the principle of being a human being, and don't harm or deceive others, let's forget those unpleasant things in life as soon as possible, right?

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/AsikOxziEgzJ_lCLaRlUD.png?height=266&width=430)

Sometimes people are just weird. The work is easy, free and less stressful, but they always stare at low wages and never think much about how comfortable they are. On the contrary, the work is tense, unfree, and the pressure is high, and you always stare at the pressure. You should look at the high labor remuneration. How many people envy and dream of it? God can't give you everything, only let you do whatever Choose the same, understand this truth, and naturally find the reason why many people are unhappy. We must measure ourselves properly and try not to engage in work that is beyond our capacity. After a long time, you will feel unbearable and need to stop and adjust in time to decompress yourself. Remember that age is never a problem, the problem is what kind of mentality to use. How to keep a young heart? First of all, forget your age and learn and play like a child, then you will be full of vitality and youthful.

The world is too big, and people are as small as a speck of dust. When we are unhappy, we should think more about the happiness that life brings to us. Being alive is a gift from God to us. How many terminally ill patients are fighting against the disease on the edge of death every day in order to survive. Thinking about them, we should really feel lucky. right. Do more things that are good for your body after work, maintain your own personality and style, and don't follow others' opinions blindly. A person's enlightenment must start from the source of life. Whether in life or work, we must understand it with our heart. Some things can be bought when lost, and some things are lost forever. Life is the need for us to constantly accumulate strength, in order to be able to play freely.To live is to be calm and free, you really don't have to take too much into consideration. Only after you have tasted all the flavors of life can you realize the true meaning of life. Whether you are looking for it hard, or you encounter it on the way, please cherish everything that is beautiful around you. Times have changed, things are right and wrong, and many things are beyond our control. I have a calmness and indifference in my heart, a little bit more persistence, a little bit of strength, and I keep precipitating myself in the years, smiling and cheering to the past. As long as our hearts are full of sunshine, we will be able to reshape a new self.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PL-gdyMnFMCYPPzBKSUKS.png?height=295&width=474)

The night was long and quiet, and you could hear your own heartbeat. The night is warm and leisurely, so that the impetuous heart returns to peace. The night is still deep, and when the hustle and bustle dissipates, the excitement will eventually return to dullness. I donâ€™t know how many times I wake up from my sleep, with thousands of emotions that I canâ€™t bear, and lingering past events, feelings, dreams and disappointments. I don't know where the dream is tonight? Maybe it's beautiful, so beautiful that I don't want to wake up. In fact, human life is a kind of mood, no matter love or hate, success or failure, people will always rise and fall, not to be happy with things, not to be sad, we must face it calmly and pass it with a smile.

title: Netflix reported Tuesday
body:
[Netflix](http://www.cnn.com/2022/07/17/investing/stocks-week-ahead/index.html) reported Tuesday that it lost 970,000 subscribers in the second quarter of 2022 â€” a number far lower than its own forecasts, which had projected that [the streaming giant](http://www.cnn.com/2022/04/20/media/netflix-stock-drop/index.html) would lose two million subscribers.

The company also said it would add another one million subscribers in the third quarter, a number that was slightly lower than Wall Street expectations. But investors were clearly happy with the results, and Netflix shares jumped as much as 8% on Tuesday in after-hours trading.

After disclosing in April that it [lost 200,000 subscribers](http://www.cnn.com/2022/04/19/media/netflix-earnings/index.html), leading to a steep drop in its share price, all eyes were on Netflix Tuesday, with Wall Street, Hollywood and the media world all hyper-focused on its subscription numbers. The company's shares had dropped dramatically [during a nightmare year.](http://www.cnn.com/2022/04/19/media/netflix-earnings/index.html)

* 

But Netflix's second quarter profit came in at $1.4 billion, up from $1.3 billion in the year-earlier quarter. Revenue jumped roughly 8.6% year over year, to $7.9 billion.

* 

Netflix's biggest subscriber loss came from its biggest market, the United States and Canada, where the streamer said it lost 1.3 million users in the second quarter. But that was offset by increased subscriptions elsewhere.

title: willingness
body:
Deep in the mountains, there is a village. The farmers here have a habit of leaving 10% of the grain for the birds to eat after the autumn harvest, so the birds stay here every year and constantly eliminate pests. As a result, the next year, the farmers are happy After a bumper harvest, another 10% of the food is left behind...

This story gave me a great shock, the "willing spirit" of the villagers is really admirable. In fact, in our daily life, we can also have this "willing spirit".

Willing, a beautiful life attitude. The story of Liu Bei's three visits to Caolu has been passed down through the ages. What he paid may only be three breaks, but what he got was Kong Ming's loyal assistance. His willingness also showed to the world at that time his attitude of respecting and cherishing talents, so more and more capable people with lofty ideals joined his account, thus achieving a generation of hegemony. A willingness not only reflects a person's courage and courage, but also reflects a person's attitude in life and his morality. Only such a person can win the follow of talents and win recognition and appreciation from all walks of life. So, willing, in fact, shows a person's attitude in life.

Willing, a kind of open-minded life feelings. Fishing is becoming more and more popular now. In fact, fishing is a loss-making business. You give up far more than a little bait. You have to wait hard in the hot sun, but sometimes you can only catch a few fish or even Can't catch fish at all. Why is this kind of give-and-take movement so popular? Some say it's a hobby because fishing brings them fun. Yes, people don't do everything to gain, and sometimes giving up is a joy in itself. Those anglers under the scorching sun have no idea how many fish they can catch, they are just looking for fun in their favorite sport. The fishermen's disregard for gains and losses is also a manifestation of their open-minded life feelings. Such people are generous and generous, and they don't care too much. They are willing to give up, but they don't care. When we were still busy with our livelihood, they had already learned about life from fishing and had their own open-minded feelings. So, willingness, in fact, reflects a person's feelings in life.

Willing to, a supreme realm of life. In our life, there are always some people who are always complaining, complaining that life is rough, that life is hard, and that work is tired. Complaining can't solve any problem, and fate is fair. Tao Yuanming said in "You Orchid", "If you lose your way, you may be able to get through." When we suspect that this road is unreachable, why don't we abandon it and find another way? Don't be reluctant to give up, some things can only be moved forward easily if you let them go. The more you let go, the calmer your heart will be; the more you let go, the calmer your path will be. When you can give up everything and let go of everything, you already have a supreme realm of life. So, willing, in fact, can make people achieve a supreme realm of life!

Wu Song gave up his arms, but captured Fang La; Gecko gave up his tail, but escaped. It is painful to give up, but how can it be rewarded to give up? The word "willing" was coined by the ancients to show future generations that one should give up first and gain later. Maybe, we will never have such attitude, feelings or realm, but we have the right to pursue. I believe that when you learn to be willing, you can take your own life path calmly!

One last question: Are you really willing?

title: Running back up the hill
body:
### Running back up the hill

* 

Netflix ([NFLX](https://money.cnn.com/quote/quote.html?symb=NFLX&source=story_quote_link)) needs this type of result right now. The most recent quarter showed the biggest subscriber loss in its 25-year history, but even that could be considered a win for the company right now that the numbers came in much lower than expected.

In [April's earnings report](http://www.cnn.com/2022/04/20/media/netflix-stock-drop/index.html), the company disclosed that it lost subscribers for the first time in more than a decade. Its [stock tumbled](http://www.cnn.com/2022/04/19/media/netflix-earnings/index.html), hundreds of employees [were laid off](http://www.cnn.com/2022/06/23/media/netflix-layoffs/index.html) and doubts ran rampant about the company's future â€” and about the streaming business as a whole.

On Tuesday, those concerns all but vanished as investors were pleasantly surprised that the losses weren't worse, and cheered with the company's projection that it will see growth in the third quarter.

"You can't afford to turn your air on anymore. That's very sad," said Morris, who is also staying home more because of [high gas prices](https://www.cnn.com/videos/business/2022/07/10/d1.cnn). "Any other summers, I will turn my air on. But this summer, it's just way too expensive."

[Heat waves ](https://www.cnn.com/2022/06/18/weather/record-heat-midwest-southeast-weekend/index.html)have impacted the vast majority of the US during the first half of the summer, forcing Americans to deal with sweltering conditions. More than 100 million people [were under heat alerts on Tuesday.](https://www.cnn.com/2022/07/19/weather/us-heat-extreme-warning-forecast/index.html)

High-temperature spells have become more frequent and intense with each passing decade**,** and they last longer than they did before, according to the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.

That includes a new, lower-price tier that will be supported by advertisements, which will "complement our existing plans." The company said it expects to launch the plan "around the early part of 2023."

It was reported last week that Netflix would partner with Microsoft ([MSFT](https://money.cnn.com/quote/quote.html?symb=MSFT&source=story_quote_link)) on[ building this new ad tier.](http://www.cnn.com/2022/07/13/media/netflix-ads-microsoft/index.html)

"They are investing heavily to expand their multi-billion advertising business into premium television video, and we are thrilled to be working with such a strong global partner," Netflix said. "Our advertising business in a few years will likely look quite different than what it looks like on day one."

* 

Netflix also spoke about clamping down on [password sharing](http://www.cnn.com/2022/04/22/media/netflix-passwords-sharing/index.html), saying that it's in the "early stages of working to monetize the \[more than\] 100 million households that are currently enjoying, but not directly paying for, Netflix."

"We know this will be a change for our members," the company said. "Our goal is to find an easy-to-use paid sharing offering that we believe works for our members and our business that we can roll out in 2023."

title: Long-term solutions
body:
### Long-term solutions

On Tuesday, Netflix explained to investors how it plans to keep the company on the right track.

"In the near term, a key priority to re-accelerate revenue growth is to evolve and improve our monetization," Netflix said in its shareholders letter.

In the early days of streaming, Netflix kept its "pricing very simple with just one plan level" before introducing multiple pricing tiers in 2014, the company wrote. Going forward it will "focus on better monetizing usage through both continued optimization of our pricing and tiering structures."

title: Even when the
body:
Even when the temperature soars into the 90s, Linda Morris won't turn on her [air conditioning ](https://www.cnn.com/2022/07/18/health/how-to-stay-cool-without-air-conditioning-wellness/index.html)until she feels she's about to faint.

Instead, the retired postal worker tries to escape [the heat](https://www.cnn.com/2022/07/07/weather/excessive-heat-us-south/index.html) in the unfinished basement of her Hickory Hills, Illinois, home. She brought down a chair so she can read there.

And, to avoid using her stove while upstairs, she makes sandwiches and warms up food in the microwave.

* 

Morris, 65, already had her power shut off in June -- when the thermometer in the Chicago area hit at least 90 degrees on seven days -- after falling behind on her payments. She was forced to use savings to settle the nearly $500 tab, which she can't do again since she's on a fixed income after retiring last year.

title: But many people
body:
But many people have had to curtail their air conditioning usage to try to keep their electricity bills in check, as they also struggle with the spike in price for[ food](https://www.cnn.com/2022/07/13/business/grocery-inflation/index.html), gas and other essentials.

Americans' electric bills are expected to increase by 20% to an average of $540 for this summer, compared to the same period last year, according to the National Energy Assistance Directors Association.

But even if people limit their usage, they may still get bigger bills. That's because residential electricity prices are rising at a faster pace this summer than in many previous years, according to the US Energy Information Administration. The increase is driven in part by the surge in [cost of natural gas](https://www.cnn.com/2022/04/18/energy/natural-gas-noreaster/index.html), which is used to generate electricity. Natural gas prices jumped following a production slump during the pandemic, as well as shortages due to the war in Ukraine.

Air conditioning, however, is not merely for comfort. It's a necessity for many people, particularly those in poor health. More than 700 people in the US die from [heat-related causes](https://www.cnn.com/2022/06/15/health/extreme-heat-hurts-health-wellness/index.html) every year, on average, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. The deaths are generally considered preventable.

"Extreme heat events are deadly, and they are increasingly frequent," said Stephen Walls, a clean building advocate at the Natural Resources Defense Council. "Cooling assistance could help avoid hundreds of deaths per year."

title: program's $3.8 billio
body:
Congress poured $4.5 billion into LIHEAP from the American Rescue Plan, adding to the program's $3.8 billion allocation for the current fiscal year. But it still isn't enough to meet the need for heating alone, much less cooling.

"The core problem is we don't have enough money to run a robust cooling program," Wolfe said, noting that the importance of this hasn't "registered yet" in Congress.

Alice Gachuzo-Colin of Springdale, Arkansas, turned to a local nonprofit agency last month to ask for help paying her electric bill so her power wouldn't be shut off in the middle of the night. But she was told it had no available funds and to try again later.

So she had to drain nearly all her savings to pay the $256 bill. And for July, the tab is $314, which she has had to point out to her three children.

"Yesterday, there was a big, huge meltdown in my house because my kids were like 'I'm hot,' and I'm like 'Y'all, the light bill is 300 and something dollars,'" Gachuzo-Colin, 43, who works as a personal banker at a local bank, said in mid-July.

Typically, she pays $160 or $170 a month during the summer.

title: Shutoffs loom
body:
### Shutoffs loom

Only 17 states, plus the District of Columbia, have protections that prevent utility companies from turning off the power of people who fall behind in their bills. But they only take effect when temperatures hit a certain level or when a heat advisory is in place, Wolfe said. For Nevada and Delaware, for instance, that threshold is 105 degrees.

This compares to 33 states and the District of Columbia that prevent utilities from [shutting off the heat ](https://www.cnn.com/2022/04/24/politics/us-gas-electric-moratoriums-end-liheap/index.html)during the winter.

Nearly all states and the District of Columbia provide some protection for residents with certified medical conditions, though many only delay the disconnection for 30 days.

Still, many people whose health is compromised by hot temperatures don't qualify.

Though he suffers from a thyroid condition that makes him very sensitive to heat, Walter Protheroe now sets his air conditioner at 78 degrees, instead of a more comfortable 72 degrees. That keeps his electric bill affordable since he's disabled and living on a fixed income.

But it means the 64-year-old Houston resident has to spend most of the day lying down on the couch. He can only take short walks outside twice a week, instead of his daily one-mile stroll, because he can't return to a cool home in a city contending with its hottest summer to date.

* 

A former research engineer, Protheroe thought his June bill would be around $90, but it was $125. He's expecting to have to shell out about $150 this month and probably more than $170 in August if the heat continues.

title: Lack of federal assistance
body:
### Lack of federal assistance

But there's far less government aid available to help people afford to cool their homes, compared to heating them in the winter, said Mark Wolfe, executive director of the National Energy Assistance Directors Association.

The federal Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program, known as LIHEAP, helps [low-income Americans pay their heating and cooling bills](https://www.cnn.com/2021/11/24/politics/home-heating-assistance-program-liheap/index.html). The money is distributed through states and local community groups, but only 34 states and the District of Columbia offer cooling aid to their residents. All states run programs to help people keep the heat on in the winter.

What's more, just 15% of the federal funds is used to cover cooling costs.

title: life is lonely
body:
Life is delicious, what a good thing to say. This taste, sweet and sour. It's sweet, light, and not warm at all. It's a lingering fragrance. Only when you sit still, be alone, and your heart sinks, you can smell the incense, floating in the air, for a while, for a while...

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/AtvfBTcRaRv5z8gNwMOIb.png?height=280&width=460)


â€‹â€‹
Life is tasteful. This taste, tender. It must be a tender willow in early spring, yellow-green with worm-like buds. Just tender. When the wind blew, Liu Qingwu swayed on the shore. It is a magnolia with a white tip, no more or less, showing a small head, looking ashamed to cover it. It is also the Spring Festival on the street. Star-like embellishment of pink tender branches. Only a few flowers have seen the whole spring. The taste of life is green and tender.
â€‹â€‹
Life is tasteful. It must be an ancient temple in the deep mountains, mountain streams and clear springs, and egrets flying. It is a stone, and there is a large blank outside the mountain. This taste. is a tree and you see a forest. A drop of water, you dream of the vast sea. A blank, you see a mirage. This taste, mood, far away.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/LFRGdZuzQ-FGF-bb0i4jl.png?height=280&width=328)


â€‹â€‹
Life is tasteful. It must be bluish, faint, and quiet. Yes, it is the color of lavender. Quiet, with a little melancholy. That sadness is the fragrance of the dead of night. That flower is a flash in the pan. A moment, aftertaste, endless. It is also the whiteness of the begonia, and it opens up quietly, and silence is worth a thousand words.
â€‹â€‹
Life is interesting, it must be Liu Zongyuan's lone boat, the liu, who fished for snow in the cold river alone. It is Tao Yuanming's picking chrysanthemums under the east fence, leisurely seeing Nanshan. It is a monk of Hanshan who travels to Qingshan during the day and sleeps under the rock at night. It was Du Mu's white cloud in the mirror, before the bright moon fell. It was Wang Wei who went to a place where the water was poor and sat and watched the clouds and water.
â€‹â€‹
Life is interesting, it must be pottery, simple, plump, and quiet. It has been hidden for thousands of years, and the ancient meaning that cannot be contained will be rewarded to those who understand it. It must be Song Porcelain. Light, thin, elegant, graceful. Like a woman in a cheongsam, stepping on a lotus step, she came slowly, and suddenly she passed by, pursing her lips, the laughter rippling in the watery sky.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3gXzkjTaMG6x_pSLpOpp8.png?height=280&width=427)


â€‹â€‹
Life is tasteful. This taste. It is colorless water, clear. It is the line of the ridge, soft. It is a vine on a tree, cherishing each other. It is not the love of Concubine Yang Guifei and Emperor Xuanzong of Tang. A piece of white silk was stabbed to death on Maweipo. It's not the love between Li Yu and Emperor E. After the love, the new face changed to the old one. It's not that Liu Yong and the woman in Fengyue Field fell in love and waved goodbye to the cloud of love. Nor is it Van Gogh's sunflowers, burning fervently. One piece, one piece. Not even the starry sky, rolling and roaring, full of emotions. It is the love between Lu You and Tang Wan, deep and shallow, lingering for a lifetime. It is the thoughts of Bai Juyi and Xiang Ling, their hearts mirror each other, and the earth will last forever. It is the graceful grace of Song Ci, and the small bridge and flowing water in the south of the Yangtze River.
â€‹â€‹
Life is delicious, yes, Qinghuan.
â€‹â€‹
This Qinghuan is a little bit of red on the steamed bun. A hint of green in early spring. A touch of white in winter. It was a subtle joy, a small smile in my heart. Quietly. Only the heart knows. It is light footsteps. It's fluttering catkins. It's a nianhua smile. It's not the time when the title of the Golden List is not the bridal chamber's candle night, and it's not. This Qinghuan, thin cool, long-term, beautiful.
â€‹â€‹
This Qinghuan is written by Dai Wangshu, the woman in a cheongsam holding an oil-paper umbrella, walking in the misty and misty alley, alone, disappearing into the depths of the alley... It is the flowering tree written by Xi Murong, Waiting for the person she loves to pass by the tree, looking back inadvertently, smiling... It was written by Haizi, facing the sea, spring flowers blooming, waiting for the clear shadow of the future...
â€‹â€‹
This clear joy is the crispness of the water flowing in the mountains and streams in the heart of Yunshui Zen. It is the quiet beauty of the water lily dancing into the heart. It is the slow quietness of Guangling San. It is the lotus leaf He Tian Tanaka, the woman who plays the flute and sails the boat. It was an old man who lay in a lonely boat and fell asleep peacefully under the moonlight. It is a hut in the forest, a weak scholar who drinks with the moon and sings alone.
â€‹â€‹
This is pure joy. Away from the bustling city, walk into the quiet countryside, walk alone on the hills, admire the flowers and watch the moon, and return to the poetic countryside. Away from the neon flashes, look up at the stars, look for a group of fireflies, and dance in groups around you. Cook a plate of wild vegetables, drink a cup of home-brewed wine, sit alone in the courtyard, and invite the moon to drink together. Play a flute, whisper with insects, and listen to the joy of the birds in the forest. This pastoral, that is, Qinghuan. very alone. Very quiet. Very poetic. very pure.
â€‹â€‹
Lin Hejing is Qinghuan, living alone in the deep forest, with plum as his wife and crane as his son. Tao Yuanming was Qinghuan, resigned from office and returned to seclusion, and devoted himself to farming the countryside. Yu Hu is very happy, and is dependent on Baiyun every day. Lin Qingxuan is Qinghuan. Sit alone in the mountains, make a cup of good tea, enjoy the quietness of the mountains and the clear water.
â€‹â€‹
Life is delicious, yes, Qinghuan.
â€‹â€‹
This kind of life is lonely and indifferent to the world. Even in the mortal world, keep the truth, the purity, and the beauty alone. Born from nature, go back to nature. With flowers as companions, with trees as friends, with mountains and rivers as neighbors. Enjoy the sunshine of the four seasons, love the blue sky and white clouds, the mountains and flowing water.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/g1ikHNNxryOpbt8CJ59YT.png?height=270&width=397)

title: Electric companies
body:
Electric companies have expanded their flexible billing and payment programs during the pandemic to help customers stay current, Adam Cooper, senior director for customer solutions at the Edison Electric Institute, the trade association for investor-owned electric companies, wrote in an email. Many allow customers to enter balance billing programs, where they pay the same amount every month. This smooths out seasonal spikes in usage.

The companies also reach out to consumers suffering from financial hardships and educate them about assistance programs, such as LIHEAP, Cooper said.

But repayment plans don't always relieve the financial strain on families. Minneapolis resident Scott Norcross entered one recently so his power wouldn't be shut off after he fell a few hundred dollars behind in payments, mainly from using the air conditioner over the last few months. He now has to shell out around $100 on top of his monthly bill, which he says is three times more than it used to be prior to the pandemic.

"Our electric bill had just gone higher and higher and higher," said Norcross, 55, who is disabled and is affected by the heat. "We can't really afford the extra payment, but we have to do something if we want to keep the electric on."

Norcross, whose wife is a personal care assistant and older son works in retail, applied for energy aid but was told his family's income was $800 over the limit.

So the couple and their two young adult sons sit in their car and run the air conditioner for 20 to 30 minutes to cool off a few times a day, depending on how hot it is. The temperature climbed to at least 90 degrees on Tuesday, which would be the 13th time it's hit that level this year.

title: books and times
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XnQlLxYtZYOs0nK4R8kKW.png?height=266&width=457)

I have read a very time-consuming book, but it mainly depends on the level of sophistication of its content, as well as the analysis and description of the times. Every era has the same love, but different love stories. The content of the story is always greater than the elegance of the language. The more the book is branded by the era, generally speaking, it will always have a large space. That is because the era originally It is very rich, and it also shows the appearance of aristocracy in content. Good things will always stand the test of time, because there are still special characteristics given by the times, so it is impossible to erase them. It will be the most lively, like a drama. But that is history, no matter whether it is derogatory or praised, it has its meaning of existence.
â€‹â€‹

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/x_cM0w0NztD3ViPjAZ3jO.png?height=270&width=387)


Looking at the world from one angle will always seem narrow, but it can know a lot of unexpected things. The world looks very big, but some things make it very small. The advent of the information age has changed the original appearance of the world. Even some ancient peoples must be extra protected, for fear that they will become unrecognizable under modernization. It's hard to imagine how curious the world is about being behind. We keep leaving the past behind, wanting to keep some memories of the past, but still ushering in a future that looks familiar. The digital age has made life what we all want it to be, and every day someone teaches us to learn a new life. There seems to be no end, but we can only run forward. This kind of life looks flashy, but it is very easy to produce fatigue, and we may never be able to go back to the simple and busy life in the past. Various realities tell us that we can learn to live only by mastering certain resources. Books will tell us how to live. No matter what books are, they are a symbol of spirit and a platform for wisdom. As long as you have ideas, you will naturally reveal them, stamp the stamp of the times, and become the best assistant to record the times. And life is a sign of the times.
â€‹â€‹
There are more and more books to read, and there are more things that can be imagined. People are doing the process of creating the era every day. We need more things to satisfy ourselves, but we cannot satisfy the creators who are struggling on the road of surpassing themselves. What you open the window and enter into your eyes is the desire for life. It seems that it is the era. In fact, I donâ€™t know that I am in life, but I just need the appearance outside the window. The book says that life is me and what I do, but that It is not as good as the life we â€‹â€‹see. When I thought that what was outside was reality, I realized that the place where I stood is the reality. Books are not here to fight, but to tell you when you thought it was the times, it was life.
â€‹â€‹
The world in the book is a person's world. I just feel that we should try to see our own world. What time has left us? Some things are invisible but have inner meanings that cannot be changed. People who like books may not have the same experience. We are not the protagonists. The times always create their successors, and books are the best masterpieces of the times. Because of the times, there is a culture that symbolizes the meaning of the times. We think that a person or a group of people can control the times, but the times use them to create themselves.
â€‹â€‹
In the end, our lives are still constantly changing in the times. This is a kind of progress and a result of the times.

title: The State of Filecoin
body:
As the centralized services have become an increasingly critical part of how we live our lives online, so the need for alternatives becomes ever greater. Humanity will need a better internet that can harness the web infrastructure far more efficiently. Thatâ€™s where [Filecoin](https://www.filecoin.com/) comes in, letâ€™s dig in!.

# Demystifying Filecoin

Internet is increasingly centralized, fragile and inefficient. Most cloud storage services are provided by companies that have absolute control ([centralized data monopolies](https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/amazon-web-services-outage-cloud-b1762074.html)) over the data stored on their servers and suffers from vulnerable choke-points (poor data safety).

This model requires users to trust the service provider. [They must trust the company](https://www.nytimes.com/2020/10/06/technology/amazon-apple-facebook-google-antitrust-report.html) to not modify the stored data nor censor them by denying access to the service. Furthermore, the users have no way of verifying that the data has not been manipulated since it was uploaded unless they have a copy of the original data.

Thanks to its decentralized nature, the power of the network lies in its community. Filecoin itself isn't the gatekeeper for storage, the community is. In short, Filecoin allows anyone to rent-out free space on their computer to other users who are looking to store data. It can be thought as similar to the Airbnb model, which allows anyone to rent out a room in their house or even the entire house. 

Filecoin is a decentralized peer-to-peer network that allows its users to store and retrieve data on the internet, robust foundation to store the world most valuable data sets and alternative to conventional cloud storage services. An alternative to costly cloud storage with open platform and a market economy that allowing users to take advantage (store, request, and transfer data) of its unmatched network capabilities via a verifiable marketplace.

The four key features that Filecoin bundles together:

1. **Connects clients with storage providers**

   Clients and storage providers make deals (i.e., storage agreements) to store or retrieve data using [FIL as the medium of exchange](https://docs.filecoin.io/about-filecoin/how-filecoin-works/); connects people who have excess storage space with people who want to store data, efficiently priced (minimizing financial barriers) and geographically decentralized storage.
2. **The network is completely [open-source](https://github.com/filecoin-project/community#forums)**

   Enabling people from all over the world to participate, meaning that anyone can store data on the network or become a storage provider. The price of storage depends on supply and demand.
3. **Built on [InterPlanetary File System (IPFS)](https://ipfs.io/)**

   Using Filecoin directly requires technical skills, protocols can be built on top of Filecoin and IPFS ([adds economic incentives to store files on IPFS](https://docs.filecoin.io/about-filecoin/ipfs-and-filecoin/)). These protocols make interacting with the blockchain easier.
4. **The Filecoin protocol runs on an advanced and novel proof system**

   A blockchain that incentivizes its miners (i.e. node operators) to store other users data in return for block rewards paid in Filecoin (FIL) tokens using a combination of [Proof of Spacetime (PoSt) and Proof of Replication (PoRep)](https://filecoin.io/filecoin.pdf), to provide unmatched efficiency and reliability. The miners store data and have to provide frequent cryptographic proofs for it. Users can verify that their data is stored correctly by looking at the cryptographic proofs on the blockchain.

Over the previous decade, advances in blockchain technology have enabled applications that were not possible before. Storing valuable data including sensitive information on another machine may appear suspicious at first glance. It is feasible to establish a large-scale data storage network utilizing modern blockchain technology, where it is practically difficult to modify the stored data without breaking the chain.

With Filecoin, they breaks down the data before storing it to ensure that attackers cannot access the data saved by anyone anywhere in the network. As a result, if a malicious actor attempts to access a file stored in the system, they will only see nonsensical data fragments.

![How the Filecoin network operates](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/msIY7ysRjR7zTdVnq7Rp_.png?height=705&width=1160)

There is an enormous amount of data information available, and it is critical to be able to authenticate its veracity. For example, government documents, laws and other legal documents, scientific data and reports, cultural heritage, etc. Moreover, many peopleâ€™s trust in institutions, governments, and companies has diminished, creating a demand for trustless ways of storing data.

The global cloud storage market is dominated by large tech companies such as Amazon, Microsoft, and Google. These companiesâ€™ cloud infrastructure servicesâ€™ combined yearly revenue exceeds 100 billion USD, although this number includes both storage and computing.

![Circulating market caps of notable cloud storage services built on blockchain](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dA2cYo9tiamfBVXAWz25A.png?height=832&width=1456)

Filecoin competes with large tech companies, conventional tech startups, and other blockchain protocols. Its on-chain competitors include Akash Network, Arweave, Siacoin, and Storj. Filecoin is the largest cloud storage service built on blockchain as measured by storage capacity or valuation, but how much do we have to play with?

## F\*undamentalizatorrrr

Filecoin generates revenue by charging fees for computation, storage, and transactions on the blockchain. The fees are paid in FIL. A fraction of the fees are burnt to reduce the supply of FIL, while the remaining is paid to miners. Potential future revenue streams for storage providers may include other fees, such as fees from smart contract apps or decentralized compute services. 

![Distribution of FIL](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tf0WwlCdqdaXbWL7cgp2T.png?height=832&width=1456)

The maximum supply of FIL is 2 billion, of which 220 million are in circulation. As indicated in the diagram above, the tokens are allocated to miners, Protocol Labs, investors, and the Filecoin Foundation. Protocol Labs, investors, and the Filecoin Foundation are on a 6-year linear vesting schedule. The miners will receive the tokens allocated to them as block rewards over several decades depending on network usage. The price of FIL, shown in the figure below, peaked in April 2021 and has since fallen near its ICO price.

![Price of FIL](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EksswnGvRZd6IjjWZK2ZQ.png?height=413&width=992)

The figure below shows Filecoinâ€™s circulating market cap (i.e. the amount of FIL in circulation multiplied by its price) and total revenue (i.e. fees paid). Filecoinâ€™s revenue also peaked in April 2022 with 264% growth as active storage deals grew 128% and network storage capacity grew 7%. However itâ€™s still whopping 74% lower on year-over-year basis.

![Filecoinâ€™s circulating market cap and total revenue](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jgSxnEfvMJwP8Gy9zX9of.png?height=439&width=994)

Filecoinâ€™s relatively low current revenue is partially explained by a [protocol upgrade](https://filecoin.io/blog/posts/filecoin-v13-hyperdrive-network-upgrade-unlocks-10-25x-increase-in-storage-onboarding/) that increased the blockchain throughput by an order of magnitude (a mechanism to scale throughput to 10â€“25x of its original capacity) and by the Chinese authoritiesâ€™ crackdown on cryptocurrency mining. 

A key implication protocol upgrade was that storage proofs were aggregated, which significantly reduced congestion and freed up blockspace. While the protocol upgrade benefited most network participants, it hurt the protocol revenue because it led to a reduction in transaction fees.

The networkâ€™s storage capacity has also kept growing, increasing the supply of storage and reducing its cost. The figure below shows how the fees are split between the protocol (i.e. FIL tokenholders) and supply-side participants (i.e. miners). Burning a portion of the fees is comparable to a share buyback and thus counted as protocol revenue, although, supply-side revenue decreased 4% in FIL terms year-over-year, corresponding to a 48% decline in USD terms. Near-zero storage fees impacted supply side revenue since it limited storage providers revenue to just block rewards and tips. 

![Distribution of revenue between the protocol and supply-side participants.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YCkCMc-rG2o_u61Kx82IO.png?height=832&width=1456)

Regardless of overall market conditions, Filecoinâ€™s committed storage capacity has [grown steadily during the past year](https://filecoin.io/blog/posts/filecoin-news-46/) reached over 17.8EiB. This network capacity is equivalent to more than centralized entity. Filecoinâ€™s storage capacity is supplied by over 4,000 decentralized storage providers distributed around the globe (supply dynamics tell only one side of the story about the network activity. The other side is told through Filecoin demand in the context of actively stored data).

## Catasthrope

Filecoin continue to onboard demand, it stands a chance to be a prominent provider of decentralized storage and cloud services for Web3 and traditional apps. While decentralized storage is still in its early days, the Filecoin ecosystem continues to thrive, as over +1460 projects are currently being built on Filecoin. Filecoin is being leveraged by several use cases, including:

* NFTs
* Web3
* Gaming
* Metaverse 
* Audio/Video.

In the future, the adoption of decentralized storage solutions and the integration of smart contracts built on top may open the door to novel applications. Open data initiatives and decentralized compute may enable the next generation of apps beyond storage. Filecoinâ€™s main goal is to prove its reliability as a storage provider and potentially become an enabler of a wide range of data-intensive services.

title: TARS Biweekly Newsletter: June 27 to July 10,2022 - TARS Protocol ğŸª
body:
![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*HepgJnd8GWT2PHWa7rMLWA.jpeg)

Greetings from the TARS Team!

Over the past few weeks we have crossed milestones and received huge support from the entire TARS community. We have covered some noteworthy events during the past weeks and would like to share the same with the community. [**TARS**](https://tars.pro/?utm_campaign=Newsletter%20from%20TARS%20%F0%9F%AA%90\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)** aims to provide a simple, safe, and collaborative infrastructure for crypto users to rebuild influence and trust on Web3.**

Here is a quick synopsis of all that happened in the past weeks at TARS Protocol!

## **Operational Updates**

**TARS collaborated with CyberConnect**

On Jun 26, TARS collaborated with **CyberConnect**, which is a decentralized social graph protocol that shall help dApps adapt the network effects and help build a personalized social experience.

Click [here](https://twitter.com/tarsprotocol/status/1541112374488203264?s=20\&t=f_duQJRks2tfUQOnmn1\__w\&utm_campaign=Newsletter%20from%20TARS%20%F0%9F%AA%90\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) to read more about the collaboration.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*lF0lP3pvsH8Ahk2NpMg3yQ.jpeg)

**TARS Rewards Distribution**

The distribution of rewards for the **TARS Protocol Airdrops** took place on July 4 and the campaign has been completed successfully!

1000 Random winnersâ€™ wallet addresses were collected, 50 referrersâ€™ wallet addresses and 100 lucky wallet addresses for the distribution of NFTs.

A total of **2,500 BUSD & 100 NFTs** were distributed in terms of rewards.

Where in the BUSD Airdrops were done and the NFTs shall be sent out soon. Stay tuned for the upcoming updates.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*V7UP1CUqABcCNSIJwYSFwA.jpeg)

**TARS issued a Biweekly Newsletter**

A recap of the newly introduced **TARS Biweekly Newsletter** for the following two weeks- June 13 to June 26.

Donâ€™t forget to check out all the interesting events that took place in the past two weeks at TARS Protocol and donâ€™t forget to subscribe to the Newsletter.

Click [here ](https://blog.tars.pro/tars-biweekly-newsletter-june-13-june-26-2022-df233e37fb2a?utm_campaign=Newsletter%20from%20TARS%20%F0%9F%AA%90\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)to read more.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*i8v2bRmr-XVgUWGVCUy08w.jpeg)

**Major Milestones**

**TARS Launched Claimer**

Weâ€™re delighted to share this big news with the entire community that we have made an official announcement about the launch of our another killer feature â€œ**Claimer**â€ powered by Dynamic Penalty Function (DPF).

With TARS Claimer you can easily create your own claiming rules without any coding skills and the feature shall be officially launched next week.

So excited to share the news with the entire community! Stay Tuned!

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*4BoBifYVZCHN2Htj8GTeQg.jpeg)

**The news about TARS Space is featured on Market Watch**

In June 28, the news, â€œTARS Protocol launches Space to promote more trustable brands on Web3â€, is published on Market Watch, a leading website that provides financial information, business news, analysis, and [stock market](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stock_market?utm_campaign=Newsletter%20from%20TARS%20%F0%9F%AA%90\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) data. Click [here](https://www.marketwatch.com/press-release/tars-protocol-launches-space-to-promote-more-trustable-brands-on-web3-2022-06-28?reflink=mw_share_twitter\&utm_campaign=Newsletter%20from%20TARS%20%F0%9F%AA%90\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) to learn more about the news.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*3lLrWy7hSqL9FM5D23KQ5Q.png)

**TARS completed the Security Audit Report by DeHacker**

As per our latest news, TARS has successfully completed the Security Audit Report by **DeHacker** and the White Hat hackers team.

DeHacker is a team of auditors and White hat Hackers. After an in-depth study about TARS Protocol, they have successfully completed the research and also completed the audit for TARS. The audited contracts include all the TARS features such as Smart SAFT contact, NFT Receipt minting, and the Space contract.

Click [here](https://dehacker.io/audit_reports_store/TARSProtocol.pdf?utm_campaign=Newsletter%20from%20TARS%20%F0%9F%AA%90\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) to read the entire audit report.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*CB6k1YqVe_VnQ1rNmXn0Fw.jpeg)

**Summary**

Everyone is facing the bear market this month, however, we at TARS promise to keep you all excited with all our latest news and upcoming events that shall take place in the near future and we shall celebrate the triumph of the Web3 tech with the crypto community.

We look forward to seeing you stay updated with all our updates on the product development and functioning.

Thank you for the strong support.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*gy8xyDggB9ikzCX2zvLH7w.png)

## About TARS Protocol

**TARS is an automated Web3 protocol providing trustable on-chain solutions for investment relationships*.*** Built on Non-Custodial, Secure & Audited Smart Contracts, TARS provides a simple, safe, and collaborative infrastructure for crypto users to rebuild influence and trust on Web3.

If you like TARS, kindly subscribe to [**our Blog**](https://blog.tars.pro/), join our [**Telegram Channel**](https://t.me/tarsprotocol), follow us on [**Twitter**](https://twitter.com/tarsprotocol), check out [**our Mirror**](https://mirror.xyz/tarsprotocol.eth), and feel free to join [**our community**](https://discord.com/invite/tarsprotocol) and build with TARS. Stay updated on the progress by following on social media channels and communities below.

title: The four most time-wasting things in life, are you doing it?
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pZzq4HX1LVtjciYBTpYlU.png?height=266&width=462)

If you say that doing something is a waste of time, then it specifically means that you can neither gain anything nor solve the real problem by doing it, and waste time and energy in vain. If this is the case, why do it? Stop it, a finite life cannot be an infinite waste of time.

worry

Being mediocre is embarrassing yourself, making yourself tense and worrying every day, and it will only make you physically and mentally exhausted. There will always be variables in life, there will always be wind and rain, and no one can predict everything in advance. So, instead of worrying and worrying about yourself, it is better to let yourself live every day with ease, let nature take its course, face everything calmly, and donâ€™t let worry imprison your body and your heart.

complain

A life full of complaints will gradually drift away from happiness. Dissatisfaction with the environment, dissatisfaction with others, dissatisfaction with fate, dissatisfaction with reality, and finally dissatisfaction with your own choices and decisions... Complaining will weaken your strength to struggle, hinder your progress, and make you fall into negative emotions and cannot extricate yourself. . Try to let yourself face all the wind and rain bravely and calmly, accept every decision you make, even if the process is full of hardships, don't give up easily, let alone hold back and feel sorry for yourself.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DpTOOCOyyGvEz8CMLd6O4.png?height=266&width=420)

complain

When things go wrong, blame others first; if things go wrong, complain about conditions first. This is a passive attitude towards life and a manifestation of lack of responsibility. Complaining doesn't help at all, it just makes you lose sight of your own problems and your mistakes. Smart people will know how to reflect on themselves first and find answers from themselves. Only with this positive attitude to face the problems encountered in life can you learn lessons, gain experience, and make you go more smoothly in your future life.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/e__fpckfYEaewDO-DiHgJ.png?height=266&width=420)

Compare

In life, it is the right way to feel happy or unhappy, satisfied or unsatisfied, or happy or unhappy. Don't get caught up in constant comparisons with others, don't disrupt your pace because of others. Everyone has their own opportunities and blessings, and they will also encounter their own ups and downs. Donâ€™t compare the achievements and glory of others with your own, donâ€™t blindly follow or imitate other peopleâ€™s lifestyles and forget your original intentions and pursuits. Listen more to your heart, think more about your own needs, walk your own way, and live your own life.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4iNzNazH5StLSs3NdfJaz.png?height=198&width=473)

title: Fewer new single-family homes in the pipeline
body:
### Fewer new single-family homes in the pipeline

The drop in construction starts was most concentrated among single-family units, which were down 15.7% from a year ago.

The number of permits for construction of single-family homes and some multi-family buildings also fell in June from May, on a seasonally-adjusted basis. All new building permits fell 0.6% from May while single-family permits dropped more significantly by 8%. Compared to a year ago, all permits are actually up 1.4%, but those for single-family homes are down 11.4%

Multi-family building continues on largely because rents are so high.

"Given that nationwide rents have grown by 14% or more year-over-year in each month of 2022 so far and that active for-sale inventory is 28% higher than last year, it's unsurprising that builders are currently more keen on multi-family rental construction," said Berner.

This construction slowdown comes even as the price of lumber bottomed out in June, Berner said. But the relief in those prices might not last long.

"With lumber prices creeping back up in July and homebuyer demand being stifled by the rising cost of financing a home purchase, it's unlikely that much progress will be made toward closing the housing supply gap any time soon," Berner said. "In the meantime, prospective first-time homebuyers who are taking a pause from their search may find more options to rent if multifamily projects continue to receive more attention from builders."

title: Builders/Wells
body:
Home builders are hitting the brakes as building costs rise and prospective buyers get priced out of the market.

June housing starts, a measure of new home construction during the month, fell 2% month-over-month and 6.3% from a year ago, according to the US Census Bureau.

Meanwhile, a separate survey released Monday found builder confidence this month plunged to its lowest level since the spring of 2020. The National Association of Home Builders/Wells Fargo Housing Market Index is meant to gauge market conditions and looks at current sales, buyer traffic and the outlook for sales over the next six months.

* 

"Production bottlenecks, rising home building costs and high inflation are causing many builders to halt construction because the cost of land, construction and financing exceeds the market value of the home," said Jerry Konter, NAHB chairman and a home builder and developer from Savannah, Georgia.

* 

The building slowdown comes as rising mortgage rates and home prices continue to discourage potential buyers, said Joel Berner, senior economic research analyst for Realtor.com.

title: But this design
body:
But this design element ended up making the keyboards prone to trapping dust and debris. Customers have long complained about the apparent faultiness of the keyboards and its sticky or easily-broken keys. An intentionally typo-ridden Wall Street Journal column in 2019 famously [slammed the keyboards' flaws](https://www.wsj.com/graphics/apple-still-hasnt-fixed-its-macbook-keyboard-problem/), and an influential tech blogger called the keyboards the ["worst products in Apple history"](https://daringfireball.net/linked/2019/03/27/strn-kyboard) that same year.

* 

Under the proposed settlement, customers who had to replace multiple keyboards can expect payouts up to $395 and those who had a single keyboard replaced can expect around $125, according to the filing. Customers who had obtained key cap replacements can expect a $50 payout.

* 

Apple did not immediately respond to CNN Business' request for comment Tuesday. As part of the settlement agreement, Apple denied any wrongdoing and denied that any MacBooks are defective.

title: these homes
body:
"Significant segments of the homebuying population are priced out of the market," said Robert Dietz, NAHB's chief economist. "Policymakers must address supply issues to help builders produce more affordable housing."

As builders halt or slow new construction, it will weigh even further on the housing market. Housing inventory was already extremely tight, pushing home prices higher. Slowing the supply of new homes will make it even worse.

New homes that are on the market are selling swiftly in 2.4 months. The norm is around 3 to 4 months, said Lawrence Yun, chief economist at the National Association of Realtors.

"Homebuilders have been facing supply-chain disruptions and many homes started multiple months ago have yet to be completed," said Yun. "Homebuilders are waiting to see how these homes will sell before starting new construction.

* 

But overall affordability constraints may push more buyers into renting, he said.

"Housing supply challenges will continue in the coming months and into next year," said Yun.
